item.description:
We will first meet outdoors in the Cambridge Common park near the monument on the stone benches. there at 2pm and then about 2:10 go to the First Church Cambridge – the stone church in front of the sharaton commander, at the corner of Garden and Mason streets. We usually go downstairs into the children’s room to play.  

  It is in the Cambridge commons park, (not the restaurant) which has parking all around it.  The picture shown in the meetup shows the monument where we meet.  Bring your instruments and songsheets of your favorite songs.

 

[b]Original song arranging & jamming.[/b] Rehearsal of songs for performance. Generally, newcomers, intermediates and free style jamming starts at 2PM, and Rehearsal for Open mikes, shows around 3:00. Bring music sheets of your songs if possible. All musician levels welcome & encouraged. Lessons in theory or practice, music genres, or jamming if appropriate. [i]Directions will be emailed to attendees the night before or morning (by 10AM) of the meetup[/i]. If a lot of people RSVP we will extend time, so you can come late to stagger arrivals so each gets a chance to play your songs.
item.how_to_find_us: We will MEET on the stone benches near the LIncoln monument THEN GO TO CHURCH

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam / Music Rehearsal
